label: AM308: 8-in-1 IAQ Sensor
description:
AM308 is a 8-in-1 ambience monitoring sensor including the
measurement of temperature, 
humidity, 
CO2 concentration,
TVOC, 
pressure, 
light, 
motion, 
PM2.5 & PM10, etc. 
It can show visually with different modes on the E-ink screen in real-time and transmit to network server using LoRaWANÂ® technology.
